column1: Ha Ha Ha… Finally; the wizard that got everyone talking has finally arrived.
££ Who are you?! What did you do to this town?
You don’t remember me do you... hehe
££ Mom... is that you? Mom... are you okay? MOM! What happened to her?
Don’t you worry young wizard; she’s just going to be asleep for a very long time...
££ But why? Why did you do this... all of this?
The title “Wizard of Florin” was supposed to be mine. I worked hard as your mother’s apprentice
and I was the next best wizard in town until you came along...
££ I d..don't understand? What did i do?
You are her heir to be the next Great Wizard of Florin. YOU TOOK IT ALL AWAY FROM ME! All my hard work for nothing...
But now; I will take it all back... You and your mom can say goodbye. HA HA HA!
££ wait... that laugh.. I heard that somewhere before... YOU’RE THE MAYOR!
How is this possible??? I made sure everything was in order and the ghosts were supposed to slow you down...
I don’t understand... I guess you are truly the Great Wizard of Florin...
